title: Chris Tramount | CEO and Co-Founder of Scare.City | web3 talks | Aug 25th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Chris Tramount | CEO and Co-Founder of Scare.City | web3 talks | Aug 25th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Hey web3 Frenz, 

Join us for a chat with Chris Tramount (https://twitter.com/ctramount) the co-founder of Scarce City (https://scarce.city/) one of the leading Bitcoin marketplaces.

Scarce City is a Bitcoin auction house and marketplace for art, Bitcoin NFTs, collectibles, apparel, and mining equipment. Since debuting our first auction in December 2020, we've facilitated over 200 BTC in sales. Our current focus is building out our fixed price marketplace for physical items for which we welcome creators and sellers to sell their goods for bitcoin.

Hosted by,
Raphael Hyde
https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/
Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel

Music by Sunset Music Inc
